import kotlin.sequences.*

fun sumOfSquares(sequence: Sequence<Int>): Int = sequence.map { it * it }.sum()

fun squareOfSums(sequence: Sequence<Int>): Int = sequence.sum().pow()

fun main(args: Array<String>) {
    val numbers = generateSequence(1) { it + 1 }.take(100)
    println(squareOfSums(numbers) - sumOfSquares(numbers))
}

private fun Int.pow(): Int = this * this
